title: How to Make Edamame, Radish, and Ginger Salad

steps.headline: Boil the edamame in a medium pot for about 5 minutes.
steps.description: Drain and rinse under cold water.

steps.headline: Add the edamame, sliced radishes, soy sauce, sesame oil, and minced ginger to a large bowl.
Let the mixture sit for about 10 minutes or overnight in the refrigerator before serving.

text: Boil the edamame in a medium pot for about 5 minutes. Drain and rinse under cold water. Add the edamame, sliced radishes, soy sauce, sesame oil, and minced ginger to a large bowl. Fold the ingredients gently together. Let the mixture sit for about 10 minutes or overnight in the refrigerator before serving.  Finished.
